overview: Even the Titan Man, that big and rough fellow with hair on his chest, muscles wherever they can be packed on, and a cock that's a sturdy packer of its own -- even this rowdy stud has his secret fantasies. He may look like he's peacefully asleep, but inside he's churning. Rapid Eye Movements are the giveaway, the telltale flickering beneath the eyelid that reveals the presence of dreams. The four long-playing and steamy segments of R.E.M. take you into the subconscious of eight stunning TitanMen -- where the floodgates of desire are open, and everyday practicalities yield to cock-stiffening impossibilities.
title: R.E.M.
